extendedInfo.description: DISCLAIMER: Before downloading this application, please check your wireless connection and data plan. This app contains a large amount of content including video and animations. Download speeds will depend on the type of connection and your carrier. This app will be updated frequently so please check iTunes App Store periodically. The medical care of trauma patients demands fast thinking and accurate, up-to-date resources. And there is no more reliable resource for trauma information than the American College of Surgeons (ACS). This app was developed alongside their seminal course, Advanced Trauma Life Support (ATLS). ATLS has trained more than 1.5 million participants in more than 75,000 courses around the world. ATLS provides the essential information and skills for doctors, nurses, and other health professionals to identify and treat life-threatening injuries under the extreme pressures of the trauma environment. The international nature of the program means that the content is adaptable to a variety of geographic, economic, social, and medical practice situations.Whether in a hospital trauma bay, on the highway at a motor vehicle crash, in a disaster area after a bombing, or in a foreign countryâs war zone, clinicians need ready access to critical resources and references. The content and skills presented in this app will add to the armamentarium of doctors and other clinicians who treat trauma patients. The app includes a free preview of the 1st chapter.Additional content can be purchased to instantly gain full access to the following:â¢Interactive visuals, such as treatment algorithms and x-ray identification â¢Just in Time video segments capturing key skills in minutes â¢Calculators, such as pediatric burn calculator and the Parkland Formula to determine fluid administrationâ¢Animations, such as airway management and surgical cricothyroidotomyFor those who have purchased the 9th edition of the ATLS Student Course Manual, simply enter the book code that was packaged in the book to gain free access to all the content.

reviews.title: Well done..
reviews.comment: Nice job... Especially the simulation videos...
reviews.author: oladapo biya

reviews.title: Looks good
reviews.comment: Just downloaded it. Looks good. Just one issue. I have to enter my book code every time I open the app. This is very impractical as it is not possible to remember the code every time I access the app. Please do something to fix this problem.
reviews.author: Krushna Makwana

reviews.title: Doesn\'t on Samsung galaxy note.
reviews.comment: I purchased this app. It is always freezing on my galaxy note. I can\'t even open any chapter or video. Am waiting for my refund
reviews.author: F. Aderemi Ogunjimi

reviews.title: not working on Nexus 4
reviews.comment: Why let a free app download to every device when the in app purchase doesn\'t work on every device.  It\'s called fraudulent advertising. I want my money back.
reviews.author: Samuel Perez

reviews.title: Not working in glaxy note and can not contact customer service
reviews.comment: I bought this software for glaxy note and could not open chapters. I contacted and reported but no return. How can i get refund from them please.
reviews.author: Win Htut

reviews.title: Always force close
reviews.comment: I paid but very disappointed because every time i open each chapter,the apps always force close
reviews.author: Rizky Adhi Nugraha

reviews.title: App freezes on galaxy note
reviews.comment: Trying to contact site for refund
reviews.author: j Ca

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Despite being an ATLS Instructor myself, I was disappointed with the app. You have to pay for the book contents. Despite that the chapter contents and skill stations do not work. Tried to contact customers support, not helpful at all.
reviews.author: Emad Saweeres

reviews.title: atls is good application
reviews.comment: I can use this application in my job  In emergency it helps to remind guidlines
reviews.author: ABDULLAH HAYATULLAH
